mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_credit_account ( user_id, user_name, has_credit_quota, valid_date_begin, valid_date_end, quota_amount, used_amount, currency) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{hasCreditQuota}, #{validDateBegin}, #{validDateEnd}, #{quotaAmount}, #{usedAmount}, #{currency} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_name = VALUES (user_name), has_credit_quota = VALUES (has_credit_quota), valid_date_begin = VALUES (valid_date_begin), valid_date_end = VALUES (valid_date_end), quota_amount = VALUES (quota_amount), used_amount = VALUES (used_amount), currency = VALUES (currency)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, has_credit_quota, valid_date_begin, valid_date_end, quota_amount, used_amount, currency FROM user_credit_account WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND certificate_type = #{certificateType} AND certificate_id = #{certificateID}
